generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white pedestrian crossing markings and a Mercedes-Benz logo on the hood, indicating it's a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area beside the road, separated by bollards and trees, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details are visible along the street and in the background.
- wall: A low, dark-colored wall is visible behind the trees on the right side of the image.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible behind the trees on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A triangular "yield" sign and a circular "no entry" sign are visible on poles.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are visible throughout the image, lining the street and in the background.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the right side of the image, behind the trees.
- sky: A clear blue sky is visible through the gaps in the tree canopy.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road and one is visible in the distance.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
